tool_description: Show combined soccer statistics of all european clubs
name: European Soccer statistics
title: European Soccer statistics

api_list.name: /clubstatistics
api_list.description: Show statistics of all european clubs ranked by any value
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://european-soccer-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/clubstatistics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "european-soccer-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://european-soccer-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/clubstatistics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "european-soccer-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
